description.name: Impact screwdriver bit H4 25mm S2
description.long_desc:
Impact Bit H4 25mm S2 – Precision and Reliability


Tvardy H4 25mm S2 is a professional impact bit that combines durability, precision, and reliability. Made from high-quality S2 steel, it ensures long service life and resistance to intensive use, even in the most demanding conditions.


The H4 25mm S2 bit is designed for hex socket screws, providing better torque transmission and reducing the risk of slippage. Thanks to its impact load resistance, this tool is ideal for a wide range of applications.


Key Features:



  • S2 Steel – Ensures exceptional hardness and wear resistance, extending tool lifespan.

  • 25mm Length – Compact design allows for precise operation in hard-to-reach areas.

  • Magnetic Tip – Securely holds screws, reducing the risk of dropping them during work.

  • Reinforced Construction – Specially designed for use with impact drivers, providing increased durability.

  • Set of 2 Pieces – A practical solution for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

description.name: Impact screwdriver bit PH2 25mm S2 – box
description.long_desc:
Impact Bit PH2 25mm S2 – Precision and Durability in One


Tvardy PH2 25mm S2 is a high-quality impact bit designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value durability and precision in their work. Made from robust S2 steel, this tool offers exceptional wear resistance and long-lasting performance.


With its precisely crafted PH2 profile, the Tvardy bit ensures perfect compatibility with Phillips screws, preventing damage and reducing the risk of slipping. Its outstanding resistance to impact loads makes it an ideal choice for both everyday tasks and demanding assembly work.


Key Features:



  • S2 Steel – Exceptional hardness and wear resistance, ensuring a long lifespan.

  • 25mm Length – Compact size for precision work in tight spaces.

  • Magnetic Tip – Securely holds screws, making assembly easier and more comfortable.

  • Reinforced Construction – Designed for use with impact drivers.

  • Set of 10 Pieces – A practical solution for any workshop.

description.name: Impact screwdriver bit PZ1 25mm S2 – box
description.long_desc:
Impact Bit PZ1 25mm S2 – Reliability and Precision


Tvardy PZ1 25mm S2 is a high-quality impact bit designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who demand durability and precision in their work. Made from robust S2 steel, it provides excellent wear resistance and maximum efficiency.


The PZ1 25mm S2 bit is specifically designed for Pozidriv screws, ensuring greater precision and eliminating the risk of tool slippage. Its resistance to impact loads makes it an excellent choice for both home and professional applications.


Key Features:


S2 Steel – Exceptional durability and wear resistance, ensuring a longer tool lifespan.


25mm Length – Compact size for precise work even in hard-to-reach areas.


Magnetic Tip – Securely holds screws, reducing the risk of dropping them.


Reinforced Construction – Perfect for use with impact drivers.


Set of 10 Pieces – A practical solution for any workshop or toolbox.

description.long_desc:

Tvardy PH2 50mm S2 is a professional impact bit designed for maximum durability and precise assembly. Made from high-quality S2 steel, it ensures long service life and resistance to intensive use.


The PH2 50mm S2 bit is designed for Phillips screws, minimizing the risk of slipping and screw head damage. Tvardy T25 50mm S2 is a professional impact bit designed for users who value durability and precision in their work. Made from high-quality S2 steel, it offers exceptional wear resistance and long service life, even under intensive use.


The T25 50mm S2 bit is designed for Torx screws, ensuring better torque transmission and reducing the risk of slippage. Thanks to its impact load resistance, it is perfect for both everyday tasks and demanding assembly work.


Key Features:



  • S2 Steel – Provides high hardness and wear resistance, ensuring a longer tool lifespan.

  • 50mm Length – Extended reach for easier work in deep holes and hard-to-reach areas.

  • Magnetic Tip – Securely holds screws and fasteners, reducing the risk of dropping them.

  • Reinforced Construction – Specifically designed for use with impact drivers.

Tvardy PH2 50mm S2 is a professional impact bit designed for maximum durability and precise assembly. Made from high-quality S2 steel, it ensures long service life and resistance to intensive use.


The PH2 50mm S2 bit is designed for Phillips screws, minimizing the risk of slipping and screw head damage.
